import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' const StyledSettings = styled.div``; function Settings(props, { onDecreaseBreak, onIncreaseBreak, onDecreaseSession, onIncreaseSession }) { const btnClassName = this.props.isStart ? 'disable' : ''; return (
{props.breakLength}
{props.sessionLength}
) } export default Settings
